text: @PressSec I am sorry about his death that was aided by the denial, downplaying & lies about #COVID19. 153,085 deaths. Anyone who has to be hospitalized understands how bad this disease is and that is 20% who get it. Colleague had it not hospitalized but took 30 days to get over it.
